title: Masquerade
alternative_title: 가면극 ; The Masked Play ; The Masked Act ; Behind the Mask
status: 가면극 ; The Masked Play ; The Masked Act ; Behind the Mask
description:
Description :
        Why should I care about what others think? I like him.Lee Han, an underrated actor with incredible acting skills, has never had the chance to shine. After saving the lead actor, Kang Taeyoon, during an accident on set, he dies in Taeyoon's place. But when he wakes up, he has transformed into Cha Siyun, a breathtakingly beautiful man from another world."The ratings, the articles, the reactionsthey're all the best. The drama that was on the verge of cancellation is back, all thanks to Siyun."Cha Siyun, who was originally a supporting character, suddenly gains overwhelming attention. But on his way home, someone overpowers him with ease."Cha Siyun. You remember me, don't you?"His heart sinks, and his breath catches in his throat. The man, Kang Taeyoon, is looking at him with a deep, mysterious smile.+
